definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: make distinct, plain (so NH, Aram.; Lag:BN 58 prop. for Qal [[בָּאֵר]], [[בָּאׂר]], cf. deriv. infr.; Thes & most comp. Ar. ba0’ara dig a pit or well, but this prob. denom. v. Lag:l. c.)—

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[בֵּאֵר]] De 1:5, Imv. [[בָּאֵר]] Hb Hab 2:2; Inf. abs. [[בַּאֵר]] De 27:8 (cf. Bö:§ 393, 4)—make distinct, plain, of letters on tablets Hb Hab 2:2 [[כְּתׂב חָזוֹן וּבָאֵר עַל־]] [[הַלֻּחוֹת לְמַעַן יׇרוּץ קוֹרֵא בוֹ]], i.e. so that one may run past and (still) read; or, so that one may read swiftly; on stones De 27:8 [[וְכָתַבְתָּ עַל־]] [[בַּאֵר הֵיטֵב]] …. [[הָאֲבָנִים]] and thou shalt write upon the [whitewashed] stones all the words of this law, doing it plainly and well; fig. explain, expound De 1:5 [[הוֹאִיל משֶׁה בֵּאֵר חַתּוֹרָה]] Moses began (and) expounded the law.
